mmorpg.tooltip.item_modifiable_in_statio: Can be used inside Gear Modify Station.
mmorpg.tooltip.player_levelup: If your experience bar is full, use this item to level up!
mmorpg.tooltip.newbie_gear_bag: Creates a pack of beginner gear.
mmorpg.lore.newbie_gear_bag1: Three Furnaces below, five iron wills above,
mmorpg.lore.newbie_gear_bag2: seed in the middle, materialize hope!
mmorpg.tooltip.capacitor: Put inside Repair Station to decrease fuel consumption.
mmorpg.tooltip.socketable_item: This item can be inserted into a socket.
mmorpg.tooltip.aoe_spell_explosion: Casts an elemental projectile that does area damage on hit.
mmorpg.tooltip.single_target_spell_bolt: Casts a single target elemental projectile.
mmorpg.tooltip.aoe_bomb_spell: Leaves out a bomb that explodes later for area damage.
mmorpg.tooltip.ele_bonus_atk_dmg_spell: Gives buff, deal bonus damage at cost of mana.
mmorpg.tooltip.put_in_mapdevice: Right-click on Map Device to use.
mmorpg.word.bewarecreativebagbug2: while on server could clear the bag!
mmorpg.word.craftingdeletesitemsinside: Crafting deletes items inside, empty beforehand!
mmorpg.word.holdtopreventpickup: Hold in your hand to prevent item pick-up.
mmorpg.word.item_modifiable_in_station: Can be used inside Modify Station.
mmorpg.word.lvllessthanmax: Level is less than max level.
mmorpg.word.needsgearwithrunesinserted: Needs Gear with these runes inserted.
mmorpg.word.noduplicaterunes: No duplicate runes of same type.
mmorpg.word.onlyoneuniquerune: Only one Unique Rune per Gear.
mmorpg.word.rightclicktoidentifyfirst: Use to identify the first item in your inventory.
mmorpg.word.rightclicktoidentifyall: Use to identify all items in your inventory.
mmorpg.word.rightclicktoteleport: Use to teleport back from an Adventure Map.
mmorpg.word.runelvlnothigherthanitemlvl: Rune level is not higher than item level.
mmorpg.word.stormcloudspelldesc: Summons a storm cloud that deals damage over time.
mmorpg.word.useanidentifyscroll: An identification item can discern this item.
mmorpg.stat.ele_to_phys_transfer: Ele Wep DMG Converted to Phys DMG
mmorpg.stat.energy_to_mana_conversion: Energy Regen Gained as Mana Regen
mmorpg.stat.plus_summon_skeletal_army_sp: To Summon Skeletal Army Spell Level
mmorpg.stat.plus_flesh_and_mind_sacrific: To Flesh & Mind Sacrifice Spell Level
mmorpg.stat.mana_to_energy_conversion: Mana Regen Gained as Energy Regen
mmorpg.stat.phys_to_nature_transfer: Phys DMG Converted to Nature Wep DMG
mmorpg.stat.phys_to_fire_transfer: Phys DMG Converted to Fire Wep DMG
mmorpg.stat.phys_to_fire_conversion: Phys DMG Gained as Fire DMG
mmorpg.stat.phys_to_nature_conversion: Phys DMG Gained as Nature DMG
mmorpg.stat.phys_to_thunder_conversion: Phys DMG Gained as Lightning DMG
mmorpg.stat.phys_to_water_conversion: Phys DMG Gained as Frost DMG
mmorpg.stat.plus_frostball_syn_2_synergy: To Cold Essence Creation Spell Level
mmorpg.stat.plus_heart_of_ice_spell_lvl: To Heart of Ice Spell Level
mmorpg.stat.plus_heart_of_ice_syn_1_syne: To Cold Healing Essence Spell Level
mmorpg.stat.plus_heart_of_ice_syn_2_syne: To Heart of Magic Spell Level
mmorpg.stat.plus_magma_flower_syn_2_syne: To Healing Magma Petals Spell Level
mmorpg.stat.plus_purifying_fires_syn_2_s: To Fires of Judgment Spell Level
mmorpg.stat.plus_recoil_shot_syn_1_syner: To Recoil of the Hunter Spell Level
mmorpg.stat.plus_spear_of_judgement_spel: To Trident of Judgment Spell Level
mmorpg.stat.plus_flesh_and_mind_sacrific: To Flesh & Mind Sacrifice Effect Level
mmorpg.advancement.desc.addaffix: Unique items have lower chance to gain affixes, that's why these currencies are so important!
mmorpg.advancement.desc.adventuremap: Maps are used in Map Devices. Sacrificing one opens a portal to a new dimension to attain loot!
mmorpg.advancement.desc.autosalvagebag: When equipped, these bags will automatically salvage items! This means all those bad common, uncommon, and other useless items can be automatically salvaged! Higher rarity bags have a higher chance of bonus items.
mmorpg.advancement.desc.bossspawnat: Bosses spawn only in maps that can be accessed with a map device! Each boss is dangerous for different reasons. Any mob can become a boss, just like any can be Mythical rarity. Many bosses cast a spell or power up after their health reaches certain percent, be careful!
mmorpg.advancement.desc.chaosorb: Gives Chaos Stats. These Stats can be good or bad. Chaos Stats can't be removed - so choose wisely which item you modify.
mmorpg.advancement.desc.currencybag: The Currency Bag automatically picks up Mine and Slash ores, currencies, etc.
mmorpg.advancement.desc.factorystation: Turns bad gears into items of higher rarity.
mmorpg.advancement.desc.killspecificboss: Go to adventure maps and kill this specific boss.
mmorpg.advancement.desc.levelpenalty: When you kill a mob that is too high or too low level, the item and exp drops will be reduced. Try to kill mobs within 5 levels of yours.
mmorpg.advancement.desc.levelup: Every level milestone allows items to spawn with new and better affixes, sets and so on. Loot new gear to power up!
mmorpg.advancement.desc.levelup10: Starting at lvl 10, mobs will start dropping currencies and adventure maps (per default config).
mmorpg.advancement.desc.lootbag: The Loot Bag automatically picks up gears, spells, runes, etc.
mmorpg.advancement.desc.mapbag: The Map Bag automatically picks up adventure maps.
mmorpg.advancement.desc.mapdevice: This device allows you to sacrifice an adventure map to gain access to instanced dungeons. Gain special rewards like unique items and currencies, and progress through tiers for better rewards!
mmorpg.advancement.desc.masterbag: The Master Bag automatically picks up almost all Mine and Slash loot and is separated into different sub-containers for easy sorting.
mmorpg.advancement.desc.mobrarityspawnat: Mobs of this rarity spawn only after a certain level. By default its after lvl:
mmorpg.advancement.desc.modifystation: The Modify Station is used to alter gears with currencies. Currencies have special effects like adding a prefix, rerolling a suffix, etc. This station can also insert runes, and to awaken runewords.
mmorpg.advancement.desc.orboftransmutati: Upgrades an item's rarity from common to uncommon. One of the most common currency items.
mmorpg.advancement.desc.repairstation: The Repair Station is used to repair your gear. Put ores (common, uncommon, etc.) or vanilla ingots into the fuel slot and then put items to repair on the left. The station can also have a capacitor to decrease the repair cost
mmorpg.advancement.desc.salvagestation: Turns items into ores and currencies.
mmorpg.advancement.desc.stoneofhope: Recreates the item completely, giving you a higher rarity. Very useful if you have a legendary item with bad/unwanted stats. This item can only be obtained in Adventure Maps of tier 2 or greater.
mmorpg.advancement.desc.welcomemineandsl: This mod is all about killing mobs, looting epic gear, and killing more mobs!
mmorpg.chat.a_piece_of_gear_is_too_high_: You don't meet the requirements of an equipped item.
mmorpg.chat.can_not_go_over_maximum_leve: Can not go over the maximum level.
mmorpg.chat.dev_tools_enabled_contact_th: Devs tools enabled, if you see this please contact the author of Mine and Slash [robertx22], he forgot to disable them!
mmorpg.chat.unholymastery: [Damage & Utility]: At the cost of your own life force, call upon the aid of the dead to devastate your enemies. Summon undead creatures, cast powerful spells, and sap life from your enemies. Or, incur powerful damage over time effects to drain your opponents.
mmorpg.chat.physicalmastery: [Damage & Utility]: String together combos to devastate your opponents. Mix and match different combo spells to generate your own unique playstyle. Looking to do maximum damage? Choose the Force Mastery and go even further beyond.
mmorpg.chat.divinemastery: [Healing & Damage]: Invoke both the benevolence and wrath of the Gods as you bless and recover your allies around you, whilst smiting down blasphemers and heretics with the destructive powers of fire, lightning, and sheer physicality.  Like two sides of the same coin, Mastery of the Divine can either bring Restoration or Destruction.
mmorpg.chat.firemastery: [Damage]: Blast or strike away those you cross in an all-consuming infernal fire and summon forth eruptions of volcanic plume that smother your enemies in molten rocks and fire balls. The Masters of Pyromancery excels in their big damage and relentless DoT's.
mmorpg.chat.has_died_by_the_hands_of: has died by the hands of
mmorpg.chat.huntingmastery: [Damage & Utility]: With eyes like an that of an eagle, send your arrows imbued with magic flying toward your prey, and cover the skies with 1000 arrows to secure the hunt. Mastery of Hunting is done through ranged weapons, and utilizes big hits, traps, and evasive maneuvers.
mmorpg.chat.naturemastery: [DoT Damage, & Healing]: Summon the drums of the wild as you wrap yourself in thorny armor for protection and provide regenerative healing for yourself and your allies. Infect your foes with poison, and petrify them in place. Mastery of Nature provides a versatile play-style, ready for any situation through defense, damage over time, and regeneration.
mmorpg.chat.nospaceforportal: No room for the portals. Please make a 13x13 wide room.
mmorpg.chat.oceanmastery: [Utility & Healing]: Calling upon the depths of the ocean abyss and the chill of the arctic, slow your foes in place and send healing waters of the world over yourself and your allies. Draw upon your inner cool to empower your group. Mastery of Ocean can empower yourself and your allies, or create a frozen wasteland before you.
mmorpg.chat.player_died_in_a_map_world: Player died in a map world.
mmorpg.chat.stormmastery: [Damage & Utility]: Hurl tridents of lightning and blitz your way through crowds in a flash, whilst casting destructive electrical storms upon the battlefield. Fast casting and incredible mobility serve as the Storm Master's ally.
mmorpg.chat.this_is_not_an_attunement_al: This is not an Attunement Altar.
mmorpg.chat.time_ran_out_due_to_permadea: Time ran out due to Permadeath.
mmorpg.chat.you_are_not_inside_a_map_wor: You are not inside a map world.
mmorpg.chat.you_have_attuned_to_this_alt: You have attuned to this Altar.
mmorpg.chat.you_have_ran_out_of_time: You have ran out of time.
mmorpg.chat.youneedheartstone: You need a hearthstone item to attune to this block.
item.mmorpg.uniques.gauntlets.gauntlets_: Move like an Enderman, strike like a Blaze.
item.mmorpg.uniques.axe.axewaterfire0.de: My efforts to merge elements shall not be in vain.
item.mmorpg.uniques.bracelet.braceletfir: Harness Fire, wield it as your weapon. Incinerate them.
item.mmorpg.uniques.bracelet.braceletnat: Fools fight for treasure, but I keep on living.
item.mmorpg.uniques.bracelet.braceletset: No matter the depths, it will be mine!
item.mmorpg.uniques.bracelet.braceletthu: Heavenly Lightning? I call it mana.
item.mmorpg.uniques.bracelet.braceletwat: Burn them all! With Ice of course.
item.mmorpg.uniques.charm.charmnature0.d: My life may be limited, but I shine throughout it.
Jade is only worth after it is polished.
item.mmorpg.uniques.chest.chestfire0.des: What can't kill me only makes me glow brighter.
item.mmorpg.uniques.chest.chestmana0.des: The process of multiplying energy has just begun!
Those who dared to follow had long since died.
item.mmorpg.uniques.chest.chestwater0.de: I am a Fortress of pure Ice.
item.mmorpg.uniques.hammer.fire_ele_hamm: I can feel it at my fingertips.
item.mmorpg.uniques.hammer.hammerphysica: Not even mountains can bar my path!
item.mmorpg.uniques.hammer.hammerthunder: I will be safe when my enemies are dead.
item.mmorpg.uniques.hammer.nature_ele_ha: I can feel it at my fingertips.
item.mmorpg.uniques.hammer.thunder_ele_h: I can feel it at my fingertips.
item.mmorpg.uniques.hammer.water_ele_ham: I can feel it at my fingertips.
item.mmorpg.uniques.helmet.helmetfire0.d: I see flames all around me.
item.mmorpg.uniques.helmet.helmetthunder: I see sparks all around me.
What mortals can't see belongs to me.
item.mmorpg.uniques.helmet.helmetwisdom0: True wisdom is knowing you know nothing.
item.mmorpg.uniques.necklace.necklace_do: I feel my creation was a mistake.
item.mmorpg.uniques.necklace.necklace_st: Search everywhere to find what you truly need.
item.mmorpg.uniques.necklace.necklace_wi: Use your strengths to prop up your weaknesses.
item.mmorpg.uniques.necklace.necklaceene: One becomes two, two becomes four!
item.mmorpg.uniques.necklace.necklacefir: I will take down my enemies with me, in flames.
item.mmorpg.uniques.necklace.necklacenat: I seek strength only in nature.
item.mmorpg.uniques.necklace.necklaceset: I seek what is buried underneath.
item.mmorpg.uniques.necklace.necklacewat: Crystal clear and yet so incredibly tough.
item.mmorpg.uniques.pants.pantswater0.de: Try to move me, I dare you.
I summon Flame in my name!
item.mmorpg.uniques.ring.nature_ele_ring: I summon Nature in my name!
item.mmorpg.uniques.ring.ringenergy0.des: I will pay any price to continue!
item.mmorpg.uniques.ring.thunder_ele_rin: I summon Lightning in my name!
item.mmorpg.uniques.ring.water_ele_ring0: I summon Frost in my name!
item.mmorpg.uniques.staff.fire_ele_staff: Do not be fooled from a glance.
item.mmorpg.uniques.staff.nature_ele_sta: Do not be fooled from a glance.
item.mmorpg.uniques.staff.thunder_ele_st: Do not be fooled from a glance.
item.mmorpg.uniques.staff.uniquestafflif: All blood will be mine, eventually.
item.mmorpg.uniques.staff.uniquestaffthu: Controlled power can bring both energy and destruction.
item.mmorpg.uniques.staff.uniquestaffwat: What is frozen is as good as dead.
item.mmorpg.uniques.staff.water_ele_staf: Do not be fooled from a glance.
item.mmorpg.uniques.sword.swordwater0.de: Energy is everywhere, it just begs to be grasped
item.mmorpg.currency.add_set.desc: Adds a random set to an item.
item.mmorpg.currency.clear_runes.desc: Clears runes and runewords from an item.
item.mmorpg.currency.create_new_unique.d: Transform a unique into one of the same tier.
item.mmorpg.currency.exp_map.desc: Halve the map's loot bonus to quadruple the experience bonus.
item.mmorpg.currency.team_map.desc: Increase the map difficulty substantially for increased rewards.
item.mmorpg.currency.orb_of_transmutatio: Upgrades a common item to uncommon.
item.mmorpg.currency.orb_of_alchemy.desc: Upgrades a common item to rare.
item.mmorpg.currency.stone_of_hope.desc: Upgrades an items rarity by one.
item.mmorpg.currency.whisp_of_chaos.desc: Adds a Major Arcana Chaos Stat.
mmorpg.stat_desc.all_dot_dmg: Increases all damage over time effects (Burn, Bleed, Plague, etc.).
mmorpg.stat_desc.all_ele_dmg: Increases all damage of that element (both spells and attacks).
mmorpg.stat_desc.arcane_devotion_trait: Completely devote yourself to the arcane.
mmorpg.stat_desc.armor: Decreases damage taken by a percent.
mmorpg.stat_desc.assassin: On Crit, 25 Percent Chance to Buff Speed
mmorpg.stat_desc.berserkers_impartiality: Charge through your foes with brute force.
mmorpg.stat_desc.bleed_mastery_trait: Your attacks inflict bleed stacks (max 20) which each deal 10 percent of your physical damage.
mmorpg.stat_desc.block_reflect: Upon being hit, retaliate and damage the enemy (does not apply upon dodge). If actively holding the shield up and the block is successful, reflect 50 percent more damage. If the block is unsuccessful, still reflect 10 percent more damage.
mmorpg.stat_desc.block_strength: Gives a percent change to block 25 percent of incoming damage. If actively holding the shield up, percent chance DOUBLES - upon a successful block, completely nullify the hit, and upon failure, damage is still reduced by 50 percent. While actively shielding, blocks will also cost energy.
mmorpg.stat_desc.blood_mage_trait: Removes all mana. Spells cost blood instead of mana. Max blood is equal to half of your max health - you can replenish blood with any non-healing effect such as regeneration or lifesteal.
mmorpg.stat_desc.pocket_capacitor_trait: A portable capacitor? How much does it cost?
mmorpg.stat_desc.resourceful_trait: Spells that cost mana use energy instead. Spells that cost both still retain the initial energy cost (it adds on).
mmorpg.stat_desc.critical_damage: On critical hit, multiply damage by X.
mmorpg.stat_desc.critical_hit: Chance to multiply damage by critical damage.
mmorpg.stat_desc.damage_shield: Decreases all damage received by a percentage.
mmorpg.stat_desc.damage_taken: Increases all damage received by a percentage.
mmorpg.stat_desc.increase_damage: Increases all damage dealt by a percentage.
mmorpg.stat_desc.dexterity: Increases Ranged Weapon Damage, Dodge, and Energy.
mmorpg.stat_desc.dotsteal: Percent of DoT damage restores health.
mmorpg.stat_desc.ele_atk_dmg: Adds elemental damage to basic attack damage. This stat does not affect Physical Dispersion or Gained as X Element stat damage.
mmorpg.stat_desc.ele_pene: Ignore X elemental resist. Can cause enemies to take extra damage.
mmorpg.stat_desc.ele_resist: Stops X percent damage of that element.
mmorpg.stat_desc.ele_spell_damage: Increase spell damage of this element.
mmorpg.stat_desc.ele_spell_to_attack_dmg: A percent of your bonus to spell damage is added to your elemental attacks.
mmorpg.stat_desc.ele_to_phys_transfer: Converts to physical attack damage based on all your elemental attack damage.
mmorpg.stat_desc.ele_wep_damage: Increases elemental attack damage done if it was caused while holding that weapon.
mmorpg.stat_desc.elemental_focus: Increases damage of this element while reducing damage of other elements (both spells and attacks).
mmorpg.stat_desc.energy: Energy is required to perform basic attacks.
mmorpg.stat_desc.energy_to_mana_conversi: Adds to mana regen based on your max energy regen.
mmorpg.stat_desc.familiar_instincts_trai: Get in touch with your primal self.
mmorpg.stat_desc.faster_cast_rate: Reduces the amount of time needed to cast spells.
mmorpg.stat_desc.fortified_reaction_trai: Converts your dodge rating into armor.
mmorpg.stat_desc.harmony_trait: Health restoration effects now simultaneously apply to health and magic shield at 67 percent effectiveness.
mmorpg.stat_desc.health: Allows you to take more damage.
mmorpg.stat_desc.increase_healing: Increases the potency of your heals.
mmorpg.stat_desc.increase_healing_receiv: Increases the potency of incoming heals.
mmorpg.stat_desc.increased_duration: Increases duration of spells and effects.
mmorpg.stat_desc.intelligence: Increases Spell Damage, Magic Shield, and Mana.
mmorpg.stat_desc.life_on_hit: Restore a flat amount of health on attack.
mmorpg.stat_desc.lifesteal: Percent of attack damage restores health.
mmorpg.stat_desc.loot_drop_bonus: Increases loot drops of this type.
mmorpg.stat_desc.luck: Increases bonus loot and critical hit chance.
mmorpg.stat_desc.magic_shield: Acts as an additional pool of health. Regeration applies less frequently and health recovery effects don't apply.
mmorpg.stat_desc.magic_steal: Percent of attack damage restores magic shield.
mmorpg.stat_desc.magical_life_trait: Converts your magic shield into health.
mmorpg.stat_desc.mana: Mana is used to cast spells.
mmorpg.stat_desc.mana_battery_trait: 30 percent of damage is taken from mana before health.
mmorpg.stat_desc.mana_cost_red: Reduces resource cost of all spells.
mmorpg.stat_desc.mana_on_hit: Restore a flat amount of mana on attack.
mmorpg.stat_desc.mana_to_energy_conversi: Adds to energy regen based on your max mana regen.
mmorpg.stat_desc.armor_to_ms_conversion: Adds to magic shield based on your armor.
mmorpg.stat_desc.overflowing_vitality_tr: Adds flat physical attack damage equal to 1 percent of your max health.
mmorpg.stat_desc.phys_to_nature_transfer: Converts physical attack damage to nature attack damage.
mmorpg.stat_desc.phys_to_fire_transfer: Converts physical attack damage to fire attack damage.
mmorpg.stat_desc.physical_damage: The physical damage that your basic attacks do.
mmorpg.stat_desc.physical_dispersion: Upon doing physical damage, all physical damage is converted to the element of the greatest value.
mmorpg.stat_desc.phys_to_fire_conversion: Adds fire damage based on your physical damage.
mmorpg.stat_desc.phys_to_nature_conversi: Adds nature damage based on your physical damage.
mmorpg.stat_desc.phys_to_thunder_convers: Adds lightning damage based on your physical damage.
mmorpg.stat_desc.phys_to_water_conversio: Adds frost damage based on your physical damage.
mmorpg.stat_desc.plus_all_skill_levels: Increase all allocated spell levels of that school of magic.
mmorpg.stat_desc.reckless_blows_trait: Expose your weakness to give everything you have.
mmorpg.stat_desc.refreshing_breeze_trait: Dodging restores 2 percent of your max health. On an unsuccessful dodge, consume 2 percent of your max energy instead.
mmorpg.stat_desc.rogue_stealth: Stealth is removed on first damage done.
mmorpg.stat_desc.scout: Attacking has a 25 percent chance to buff move speed.
mmorpg.stat_desc.side_step_trait: A technique developed by the legendary Shadow Walker.
mmorpg.stat_desc.warlock_trait: Delve into the dark arts and draw power from the life force of your foes.
mmorpg.stat_desc.spell_damage: Increases all spell damage, including spells that scale with stats.
mmorpg.stat_desc.spellsteal: Percent of spell damage restores health.
mmorpg.stat_desc.stamina: Increases Dodge, Critical Hit, and Critical Damage.
mmorpg.stat_desc.stout_defender_trait: Stand strong and protect those who are dear to you... or just yourself.
mmorpg.stat_desc.strength: Increases Physical Attack Damage, Armor, and Energy.
mmorpg.stat_desc.vitality: Increases Health, Health Regen, and Energy Regen.
mmorpg.stat_desc.weapon_damage: Increases attack damage done if it was caused while holding that weapon.
mmorpg.stat_desc.wisdom: Increases Heal Power, Magic Shield Regen, and Mana Regen.
mmorpg.stat_desc.mob_weaken_curse: When hit, curse the attacker with a weakening curse.
mmorpg.stat_desc.mob_bloody_strike: On hit, cause target to bleed.
mmorpg.stat_desc.mob_fire_strike: On hit, strike enemies in front of you with fire.
mmorpg.stat_desc.mob_frost_nova: On hit, sweep nearby enemies with frost damage.
mmorpg.stat_desc.mob_lightning_discharge: When hit, discharge lightning damage in an AOE.
mmorpg.stat_desc.mob_speedy: When hit, give mob a 20 percent speed buff.
mmorpg.stat_desc.conjurer_trait: Tame the dead, beasts, and all creation.
mmorpg.stat_desc.overseer_trait: On attack, 50 percent chance of gaining a Fortitude Charge for 8 seconds, which each provide 4 percent damage reduction. You may have a maximum of 3 Fortitude Charges.
mmorpg.stat_desc.pain_control_trait: Deal 30 percent more damage when you have 50 percent or less life.
mmorpg.stat_desc.shulker_shell_trait: 60 percent of non-physical damage is taken as physical damage instead.
mmorpg.stat_desc.trickster_trait: On critical hit, 25 percent chance of gaining a Power Charge for 6 seconds, which each provide flat 30 percent critical damage. You may have a maximum of 3 Power Charges.
lore_0_item.currency.add_secondary_stat: More power is always good, right?
lore_0_item.currency.chaos_orb: Do not gamble what you are not willing to lose.
lore_0_item.currency.clear_runes: If only we could re-write the past.
lore_0_item.currency.item_levelup: Who said your sword can't level with you?
lore_0_item.currency.number_reroll: Hopefully works better than the last time.
lore_0_item.currency.randomize_prefix: There has always been a better choice...
lore_0_item.currency.randomize_suffix: There will always be a better choice...
lore_0_item.currency.stone_of_hope: When there is hope, there is a way.
lore_0_item.mmorpg.auto_salvage_bag: Place an item of maximum rarity you want to
lore_1_item.mmorpg.auto_salvage_bag: salvage in your off-hand, then right-click
lore_3_item.mmorpg.auto_salvage_bag: To not salvage any items, clear the config by
lore_4_item.mmorpg.auto_salvage_bag: right-clicking the bag while off-hand is empty.
mmorpg.stat.plus_triple_attack_linker_sp: To Triple Attack Extension Spell Level
mmorpg.stat.plus_flowing_river_linker_sp: To Flowing River Extension Spell Level
mmorpg.stat.plus_raging_dragon_linker_sp: To Raging Dragon Extension Spell Level
mmorpg.stat.plus_spirit_drain_linker_spe: To Spirit Drain Extension Spell Level
mmorpg.stat.plus_rallying_sweep_linker_s: To Rallying Sweep Extension Spell Level
mmorpg.stat.plus_earthen_smash_finisher_: To Earthen Smash Finisher Spell Level
mmorpg.stat.plus_elemental_vengeance_fin: To Elemental Vengeance Finisher Spell Level
